item.description:
Take a break from cooking and share good food and conversation after a long week with Party Express. SBC Brewery has a good selection of food choices at reasonable prices. Appetizers include SBC wings, szechwan dumplings, spinach dip, and calamari. There are salads starting at $6.99, pizza starting at $11.00, entrees include chicken Marcela at $14.99 to a rib eye steak at $16.99.
Go here for their web site. Please sign up on this site for dinner only. We are Joint with Southern Connecticut Dining out so it should be fun.
Ask for the table in Annette's name.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Friday Night Dinner at SBC Brewery with Party Express
